text: Arabesque is a 1966 American spy comedy thriller movie directed by Stanley Donen and is based on the 1961 novel The Cypher by Alex Gordon. It stars Gregory Peck, Sophia Loren and was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1966 comedy movies Category:1966 thriller movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Donen Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Arabesque (1966 movie)
